member.summary: Specifies that no options are set.

member.name: F:Expressive.ExpressiveOptions.IgnoreCase
member.summary: Specifies case-insensitive matching.

member.name: F:Expressive.ExpressiveOptions.NoCache
member.summary: No-cache mode. Ingores any pre-compiled expression in the cache.

member.name: F:Expressive.ExpressiveOptions.RoundAwayFromZero
member.summary: When using Round(), if a number is halfway between two others, it is rounded toward the nearest number that is away from zero.

member.name: F:Expressive.ExpressiveOptions.All
member.summary: All options are used.
